text.section:
The provisions of this Part I of this subtitle that relate to the Unemployment Trust Fund shall be effective only while:
the Unemployment Trust Fund continues to exist; and
the United States Secretary of the Treasury:
keeps in the Unemployment Trust Fund a separate account for the State from which no other state is allowed to make withdrawals; and
credits to that Account the State's share of earnings of the Unemployment Trust Fund.

If the Unemployment Trust Fund ceases to exist or the State Unemployment Trust Fund Account no longer is kept, money, property, and securities that belong to the Unemployment Trust Fund of the State shall be transferred to the State Treasury and deposited in the Unemployment Insurance Fund.
